original_text: Then Jesus said, ‘To have good fruit you must have a good tree. If you have a bad tree, then you will get bad fruit from it. You can know all about a tree by the kind of fruit that it makes.
korean_text: 나무도 좋고 열매도 좋다 하든지 나무도 좋지 않고 열매도 좋지 않다 하든지 하라 그 열매로 나무를 아느니라

sentences.original_text: you must have a good tree
If you have a bad tree
then you will get bad fruit from it
You can know all about a tree
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나무에 대한 모든 것을 알 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: by the kind of fruit that it makes
